name: telegram_bot
description: birbitt-api/ │ ├── server.js         // Entry point for the Express server ├── config.js         // Configuration for DB connection ├── .env              // Environment variables ├── models/           // Database models │   ├── userModel.js  // User data model │   └── transactionModel.js // Transaction data model ├── routes/           // API route handlers │   ├── userRoutes.js // User related routes │   └── transactionRoutes.js // Transaction related routes └── dialog.json       // JSON flow configuration
